description:
This OneNote 2013 course is designed for everyone working with Microsoft Office to efficiently use the key components of the OneNote application on a desktop, laptop, or a tablet device, when working in or away from the office or study environment.

Would you like to learn all you need to know about digitizing your notes, collaborating with others, and synchronizing your work across multiple devices? Then this course is for you!

You will learn about:

  • Taking notes digitally.
  • Using Note-collaboration.
  • Creating and updating notes.
  • Note-synchronizing skills. These skills allow you to create and update notes, manage lists and outlines, search, add content including voice memos, pictures, and video.
  • Taking notes in online Meetings.
  • Managing lists and outlines.
  • Searching and adding content including voice memos, pictures, and video.
  • Interacting with other Microsoft Software programs and much more!
title: OneNote 2013: 19 Ways to Work Smarter With Notebooks
instructors: SONIC - High Quality Training for Over 20 Years
